com.clover.sdk.cashdrawer

Class CashDrawers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clover.sdk.cashdrawer.CashDrawers

  • public class CashDrawers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides functions for working with cash drawers. Specifically, it allows clients to list all connected cash drawers from registered hardware types. By default this includes support for the following hardware types,
    • Clover Station Printer connected cash drawer
    • Clover Mini Printer connected cash drawer
    • APG 554a USB cash drawer

    This class differs from the CashDrawer class in that it abstracts any hardware cash drawer, where CashDrawer only works with cash drawers connected to configured Clover printers.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public java.util.Set<CashDrawer> list()
        Returns:
        The set of all connected cash drawers for all registered hardware types.

      • registerDiscovery

        public void registerDiscovery(CashDrawer.Discovery<?> d)
        Register a new cash drawer hardware type. Subsequent calls to list() will return cash drawers of this hardware type, if the implementation reports them as connected.
